Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Weight
Description: Plumb-line weight made of limestone with a cavity in the chipped upper section and a bulge in the middle. This weight has a relatively crude appearance, with a generally ovoid shape that is conical at the base.
